description: Residents in poorer areas call the measures discrimination as Spain tries to curb a rise in Covid-19.
title: Covid-19: Hundreds protest against localised Madrid lockdowns
title_page: Covid-19: Hundreds protest against localised Madrid lockdowns - BBC News
maintext: Residents will only be able to leave their zone to go to work, school or to seek medical care. Social gatherings within their zone will be limited to six, public parks will be shut and commercial businesses will need to close by 22:00.
